metadata.description: The name of the storage account. It must be unique across all existing storage account names in Azure, between 3 and 24 characters long, and can contain only lowercase letters and numbers.
The id of the custom model for transcription. If empty, the base model will be selected.
The key for the Azure Speech Services subscription.
The region the Azure speech services subscription is associated with.
Enter the address of your private endpoint here (e.g. https://mycustomendpoint.cognitiveservices.azure.com/) if you are connecting with a private endpoint
A value indicating whether diarization (speaker separation) is requested.
A value indicating whether word level timestamps are requested.
The key for the Text Analytics subscription.

The endpoint the Text Analytics subscription is associated with (format should be like https://{resourceName}.cognitiveservices.azure.com or https://{region}.api.cognitive.microsoft.com or similar). If empty, no text analysis will be performed.
A value indicating whether sentiment analysis is requested (either per utterance or per audio). Will only be performed if a Text Analytics Key and Region is provided.
A value indicating whether personally identifiable information (PII) redaction is requested. Will only be performed if a Text Analytics Key and Region is provided.
The administrator username of the SQL Server, which is used to gain insights of the audio with the provided PowerBI scripts. If it is left empty, no SQL server/database will be created.
The administrator password of the SQL Server. If it is left empty, no SQL server/database will be created.
Id that will be suffixed to all created resources to identify resources of a certain deployment. Leave as is to use timestamp as deployment id.

variables.AzureSpeechServicesEndpointUri: [if(not(equals(parameters('CustomEndpoint'),'')), parameters('CustomEndpoint'), if(variables('IsAzureGovDeployment'), concat('https://', parameters('AzureSpeechServicesRegion') ,'.api.cognitive.microsoft.us/'), concat('https://', parameters('AzureSpeechServicesRegion') ,'.api.cognitive.microsoft.com/')))]
